item.description: 1.68.0 # Unreleased Will be stable on: 9 March, 2023 Will branch from master on: 20 January, 2023 Mangle “main” as “__main_void” on wasm32-wasi (merged 2 days ago)

1.67.0 nightly # Unreleased, branched from master Will be stable on: 26 January, 2023 Will branch from master on: 9 December, 2022 Stop passing -export-dynamic to wasm-ld. (merged 3 days ago) Remove drop order twist of && and || and make them associative (merged 8 days ago) Don’t build compiler_builtins with -C panic=abort (merged 15 days ago) Don’t set is_preview for clippy and rustfmt (merged 17 days ago) Fix inconsistent rounding of 0.

1.66.0 beta # Unreleased, branched from master Will be stable on: 15 December, 2022 Will branch from master on: 28 October, 2022 Do not consider repeated lifetime params for elision. (merged 44 days ago) Stabilize arbitrary_enum_discriminant, take 2 (merged 47 days ago) Stabilize duration_checked_float (merged 49 days ago) Don’t link to libresolv in libstd on Darwin (merged 49 days ago) Update libstd’s libc to 0.2.135 (to make libstd no longer pull in libiconv.
